title: Classification Generator
description: A classification generator that creates classification exercises with two categories and items with hints, explanations, and mnemonics.

introduction.description: An introduction to the exercise. It should be a single short sentence.

category_1_name.description: The name of the first category for classification.

category_2_name.description: The name of the second category for classification.

items.description: A list of items to be classified into one of the two categories.

text.description: The text content of the item to be classified.

correct_category.description: The name of the correct category for this item. Must match either category_1_name or category_2_name.

hint.description: An optional hint to help the user classify the item.

explanation.description: An optional explanation for why the item belongs to its correct category.

mnemonic.description: An optional mnemonic device to help remember the classification of the item.

uuid.description: The UUID of the item (can be used for tracking the item)
